title: Coronavirus: India's PM Modi seeks 'forgiveness' over lockdown
description: Narendra Modi apologises for sweeping restrictions that have left many jobless and hungry.

 Migrants workers and their families have been crowding at bus stations as they try to get home
India's prime minister has asked for his country's forgiveness after imposing a sweeping lockdown that he said had hurt millions … [+2738 chars]
